Packaging charges on average consume around 12% of order value all the time.

I'm completely disappointed with swiggy. They randomly onboard any food restaurant and they are not responding swiggy order seriously. Customer and delivery partner have to wait for long to get the order. If customer want to cancel the order swiggy is charging cancellation fee which is not right. If customer not getting order on time they want to cancel and go somewhere else why swiggy is charging fee. You are forcing customers to stay hungry with same order. Uninstalled me and family

Slow to deliver and fakes the time . Example when it says 30m after 20 m it'll still say 20m adding 10m

A very bad experience with Swiggy food deliveries. Their app is dated & their riders change with no update on the app. Their riders suddenly disappear & you cannot connect with them. The call center agent then post you waiting for an hour asks u to either replace the order & wait for another hour or cancel. Pathetic service and app. CLOSE YOUR SERVICES.

Oh, I see! Swiggy sounds like a great app for ordering food. It's awesome that they offer a wide variety of food options. Being able to order different types of food materials is definitely convenient. I'm glad you're enjoying using the Swiggy app! Is there a specific type of food you like to order the most in this
Most of the time they don't accept orders for no reason

Really a wonderful app. It is easy to use. The restaurants and dishes, are well organised, so that customers could easily choose from them. The customer support is also too good. Really liked it. Only drawback is that their offers wont cater to everyone. They should provide 'SWIGGYIT' as a common offer, other than providing offers on some credit cards.

Swiggy is a convenient and user-friendly food delivery app that offers a wide variety of restaurant options. The app's interface is intuitive and easy to use, making ordering food a seamless experience. With quick delivery times and reliable service, Swiggy is a go-to choice for satisfying cravings.

Worst service. 🫨 Yesterday I've ordered food first time on swiggy and horrible experience late delivery and no response from help desk also. Uninstalling the app. Zomatos users this swiggy is not for us.
Swiggy app is a lifesaver! Easy to use, wide variety of restaurants, and lightning-fast delivery. It's my go-to for satisfying cravings without leaving home.

Well polished app! Swiggy has all the menus well laid out and it never feels overwhelming as they are spaced out too. Some other express delivery companies copied Swiggy's template so props again to Swiggy there! Customer service is easily accessible via the app so no issues therein either.
App is good but customer support is pathetic. I recently ordered food and i got extremely cold food which was uneatable. The support people did not even replace items or refunded me the amount.
Excellent service by swiggy. Food delivery on time .Any money refund clear in 5 minutes 👍
It's gps is trash, sometimes it shows same restaurant distance 8.8km and others times over 10.

As a loyal customer of swiggy,I was excited to sign up for their swiggy one lite membership,hoping to enjoy exclusive benefits.However,Upon ordering,i noticed a significant increase in the menu prices compared to my previous orders.This price hike not only nullified any potential savings from the membership but also left me feeling deceived and disappointed.it seems unfair that loyal customers who invest in the premium membership are being penalized with higher prices.
The worst ever customer service, now they are not even responding to mail uninstall swiggy
order took 1.5 hour to deliver when it showed that it will take 20 minutes

I had a horribly bad experience with this. I had ordered food for my mother while she was in Thiruvananthapuram. I live in Gujarat. I had located the place on their map and typed the address after that. After 45 minutes I tried to contact the delivery partner and he told me he was not able to reach the correct location as I had marked the place wrong. After that I got a call from their customer service and told me they are cancelling the order and I willl not get even one rupee as refund.

Worst customer support. I received broken eggs and have uploaded the pic in which one could easily see them. The agent on the phone admitted that he could see the broken eggs but still the team has not validated the claim. When asked for the reason for it on email, they are not bothered about conveying the reason even after 24 hours.
Unwanted deley and very poor response from customer service.

Placed an order and waited for 40 minutes but in the app showed me 11 minutes to deliver, at the end food not delivered instead they canceled the order, and said we initiated the refund they couldn't reorder same food also .I'm totally not happy with.
Charge more delivery charge Like if my food id 100 rupees from 1 km distance the delivery charge was 150rupees its more than my food

After ordering and paying delivery charges, delivery guy will deliver someone order before me and then deliver mine. Then don't charge delivery fees if doing this for both. Zomato is good in delivering order. Learn from them else you will perish.

Using swiggy from last 5 years. Customer service is getting worse daily. Being a Swiggy One member it is not good at all. From last 4 to 5 orders there is at least some problem with the service. Therefore taking one more star back.
Useless Delivery boys.. had an bad experience. Ordered worth of 4000rs food and Delivery boy ran without informing me.. now don't trust swiggy team and worst Delivery guys

column4: I ordered food from Swiggy for iftar, but before the call to prayer, the delivery person got lost, wandering around for 15 minutes while my food was already picked up. They roamed the whole city before finally delivering to me. What a disappointment! This definitely deserves a poor review.
Worst experience ever. You guys really treated your premium customer in a very bad away would never suggest anyone to use Swiggy anymore.

Worst app ever!!! Placed my order at 4.16 pm and it was supposed to be delivered by 5pm... but till 6 pm also they havent delivered my order.. restaurant is blaming delivery boy and vice versa.. so so so disappointed with my experience.. i could hv cancelled it but i hv already paid... if i havent paid i would hv just cancelled it... nobody from customer cate or helpline are picking up calls.. hope the CEO sees this

As a loyal customer of swiggy,I was excited to sign up for their swiggy one lite membership,hoping to enjoy exclusive benefits.However,Upon ordering,i noticed a significant increase in the menu prices compared to my previous orders.This price hike not only nullified any potential savings from the membership but also left me feeling deceived and disappointed.it seems unfair that loyal customers who invest in the premium membership are being penalized with higher prices.
The worst ever customer service, now they are not even responding to mail uninstall swiggy
order took 1.5 hour to deliver when it showed that it will take 20 minutes

I had a horribly bad experience with this. I had ordered food for my mother while she was in Thiruvananthapuram. I live in Gujarat. I had located the place on their map and typed the address after that. After 45 minutes I tried to contact the delivery partner and he told me he was not able to reach the correct location as I had marked the place wrong. After that I got a call from their customer service and told me they are cancelling the order and I willl not get even one rupee as refund.

Worst customer support. I received broken eggs and have uploaded the pic in which one could easily see them. The agent on the phone admitted that he could see the broken eggs but still the team has not validated the claim. When asked for the reason for it on email, they are not bothered about conveying the reason even after 24 hours.
Unwanted deley and very poor response from customer service.

Placed an order and waited for 40 minutes but in the app showed me 11 minutes to deliver, at the end food not delivered instead they canceled the order, and said we initiated the refund they couldn't reorder same food also .I'm totally not happy with.
Charge more delivery charge Like if my food id 100 rupees from 1 km distance the delivery charge was 150rupees its more than my food

After ordering and paying delivery charges, delivery guy will deliver someone order before me and then deliver mine. Then don't charge delivery fees if doing this for both. Zomato is good in delivering order. Learn from them else you will perish.

Using swiggy from last 5 years. Customer service is getting worse daily. Being a Swiggy One member it is not good at all. From last 4 to 5 orders there is at least some problem with the service. Therefore taking one more star back.
Useless Delivery boys.. had an bad experience. Ordered worth of 4000rs food and Delivery boy ran without informing me.. now don't trust swiggy team and worst Delivery guys

column5: Kaul Shishir “Kaul Saeb” Save The Blue Planet

column4: I ordered food from Swiggy for iftar, but before the call to prayer, the delivery person got lost, wandering around for 15 minutes while my food was already picked up. They roamed the whole city before finally delivering to me. What a disappointment! This definitely deserves a poor review.
Worst experience ever. You guys really treated your premium customer in a very bad away would never suggest anyone to use Swiggy anymore.

Worst app ever!!! Placed my order at 4.16 pm and it was supposed to be delivered by 5pm... but till 6 pm also they havent delivered my order.. restaurant is blaming delivery boy and vice versa.. so so so disappointed with my experience.. i could hv cancelled it but i hv already paid... if i havent paid i would hv just cancelled it... nobody from customer cate or helpline are picking up calls.. hope the CEO sees this

I ordered food normally from another app but there are few times I ordered from this app 1. On my 2nd order they have added there swigy one plan auto. I was charged 399 2. They gave me offer if you try with kotak debit/credit you will get rs x discount, but they didn't even I ordered of more amount than they keep min ordered value 3. After getting swigy one they take delivery charges if you r ordering from the restaurant is more than 2 Km away Go to hell swigy This feedback is after 15 orders
They are looting the customer. They show coupon code in app. But while applying - their app automatically remove the code & customer has to pay full amount.
Delivery is poor showing 30mins.. But delivered after 40-45mins later
I'm continuously try creat account after installing app but not verified my emails id. Jab ki email id optional haa
Customer support only make excuses,didn't provide solution, don't go for swiggy

The option to toggle the delivery options such as 'Dont ring the doorbell' does NOT WORK. It has been like that for a few months now. At one point an update fixed it but now it's back to the same error. And the delivery guys always argue with me and I have to explain to them the doorbell option isn't working it's out of my control

Recently I placed an order on instamart but the delivery guy name mohan mahanta was so unprofessional was arguing and now when I want to give a feedback about him I can't because I can't find the option of giving a feedback to instamart delivery. You really need to add other issues option too.
One of the worst app as per my experience they give coupon for discount but for their delivery charges is too high 140 rs food become 245 when you go for final payment.
Worst experience not recommended...systems pick anonymous address and coordinators are rude unprofessional and non trained
Their executive and delivery boy are taking extra money and behavior of their executive like nothing had happened.. fraud kr rhe h ye sb milkr

Swiggy is a great fraud Platform. Run it's fraud business with the help of restaurant they took price for Standard Portion and quality but delivered Small portion with bad taste . Please never use swiggy It's a Warning ⚠️ for All otherwise you will regret after using this app . I gonna to tell everyone on every social media platforms to stop using Swiggy 🤬🤬🤬🤬
Customer service is the worst,received wrong order and got nothing no refund no apology.

Worst experience I ever had . I ordered chicken from instamart but I received bad quality chickn.too much smell and packaging is good but what the use the quality of chickn is too bad ...I tried to reach customer care but no use..they told me to upload vedios and photos i tried to upload but taking too much time and at last it showing time up try again ...tried more than 5 times to upload but couldn't.
Great experience with Swiggy. I've started using this app from few months and I am glad with their service. Keep it up!!
I bought swiggy one subscription yet I have still pay over 50Rs for delivery. This is greed. I'm moving away from swiggy.
Faltu... When I shared my email address it is showing that the email address is already linked with another account... Lmao iske liye kya ab main dusra email id banau?
Ordered Food at Nandini Delex, Food taste not good.
They are not accepted the honest review. When i review food the prompt not accepted. They not give reason. today they cancel my order by waiting me more than 50 min, pure low profile app.

Hello everyone, Rating should be zero. I ordered 1 thanjavur special and 3 south meals. The amount of food delivered for was sufficient for only one person. There is manipulation at the restaurant and delivery . Swiggy, please refund my amount or face consequences. Pathetic service. In fact, the swiggy delivery person was carrying another bag but refused to give us that. App companies designing support, deciding on partners who cheat. We will meet swiggy in the consumer court.
Swiggy is great app for foodies . The app is easy to use with helpful restaurants info and ordering option And also provide the good discount with many coupancodes I really like this app!!!!!!!!🤩
Better per saste main diya karo

I am not getting any refunds from quality issue and missing items.Worst customer support.
